title: 88/439/EEC: Commission Decision of 27 June 1988 approving the programme relating to the poultry sector communicated by the Spanish Government in accordance with Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the Spanish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 27 June 1988
approving the programme relating to the poultry sector communicated by the Spanish Government in accordance with Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the Spanish text is authentic)
(88/439/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme concerning the poultry sector forwarded by the Spanish Government on 23 July 1987 and supplemented on 4 October 1987 in accordance with Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 is hereby approved, with the exception of the investments concerning products not listed in Annex II to the Treaty and game, subject to the health conditions prescribed by the Community directives on the matter being observed.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Spain.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 June 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 57, 27. 2. 1987, p. 6.
